core.process_runner

Interface ProcessRunner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessRunnerImpl

    public interface ProcessRunner
    Interface for the ProcessRunnerImpl class to implement and for other classes to depend upon. I/O Definition: Output is sent to the process and input is received from the process.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void flushOutput()
      Flushes the output buffer to the process.
      void forceCloseProcess()
      Force stops the process execution.
      void outputToScript(java.lang.String text)
      Stores the output that will be sent to the process in a buffer.
      void start()
      Starts execution of the process.
      void subscribeToInput(InputSubscriber observer)
      Subscribes an observer to receive input from the process.
      void unsubscribeFromInput(InputSubscriber observer)
      Unsubscribes an observer to stop receiving the input from the process's output.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Starts execution of the process.

      • outputToScript

        void outputToScript(java.lang.String text)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Stores the output that will be sent to the process in a buffer. Use flushOutput() to send the buffer to the process.
        Parameters:
        text - String that will be output to the process.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws if process has yet to be started or if another output error has occurred.

      • flushOutput

        void flushOutput()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Flushes the output buffer to the process.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws if the process has yet to be started or if another output error has occurred.

      • forceCloseProcess

        void forceCloseProcess()
        Force stops the process execution. Once executed on the ProcessRunner-object, the ProcessRunner will be obsolete.

      • subscribeToInput

        void subscribeToInput(InputSubscriber observer)
        Subscribes an observer to receive input from the process. Warning, all data that is output from the process will be sent, including all echoes that the process will output from using the outputToScript(String) method.
        Parameters:
        observer - Object that will receive the output.

      • unsubscribeFromInput

        void unsubscribeFromInput(InputSubscriber observer)
        Unsubscribes an observer to stop receiving the input from the process's output.
        Parameters:
        observer - Object that will unsubscribe.
